import React from 'react'; import api from '../../utils/Api.js' function Main (props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(false); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(false); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { Promise.all([api.getUserInfo()]) .then(([userData]) => { setUserInfo({ userName: userData.name, userDescription: userData.about, userAvatar: userData.avatar, }) }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) }, []) return (
